system.useTime: The Binding Strength determines how contained and controllable the Daemonhost is. A More tightly bound daemon is less powerful, yet more easily controllabe. Although even the most tightly bound daemon is a monster to behold and never to be trusted.
system.novice:
Unbound: The Daemonhost has broken its bindings and cannot be controlled, it has no master and can use its power fully.
Once-Bound: The Daemon is barely contained
Twice-Bound: The Daemon is bound by powerful wards and will generally follow orders, although always plot to escape
Thrice-Bound: The Daemon is strongly bound such that it is somewhat less likely to try to rebel against its controllers.
